LanguageData.LitF.UI.SkillBiotechDesc: To use it, you need 10 "brilliance" of the power of brilliance.\n\nIf for some reason you do not have the "brilliance", you can still use the skill, but the cooldown time will be greatly increased.
LanguageData.LitF.UI.ChildCantUseFP: Skills are not available in the Child.
LanguageData.LitF.UI.LowFP: Cannot be used because FP is 0.
LanguageData.LitF.UI.LowFPandBrilliance: Cannot be used because FP and Brilliance is 0.
LanguageData.LitF.UI.FPDesc:
FP (Feather Point, or Fairy Point) is a number that indicates how much of LittleFairy's radiant power can be used for defense.

Each FP protects against 1 damage from normal attacks. Note that this barrier does not protect against stun and EMP.

When FP reaches 0, little faeries are temporarily downed by shock.
LanguageData.LitF.UI.FPDescBiotech: \n\nIf the genetic "brilliance" is left, when the FP reaches 0, all the brilliance is consumed and the FP is temporarily recovered rapidly.
LanguageData.LitF.UI.FPSpeedHeal: Since {0} is now at 0 FP, it uses all its remaining brightness for a rapid FP recovery.
LanguageData.LitF.UI.Tips_Nursery_Lv: The level of the fairies is increased by accumulating a certain amount of experience through continuous dedication to other races. The higher the level, the stronger the LittleFairy will be.
LanguageData.LitF.UI.Tips_Nursery_XP: The experience of the nursery.\nWhen you dedicate a different species, you gain experience according to the amount of experience of the skills possessed by that species.\n(In the case of animals, it depends on their value.)
LanguageData.LitF.UI.Tips_Nursery_NextLvXP: The amount of XP required to level up.
LanguageData.LitF.UI.Tips_Nursery_NeedSkill: NeedLv:2\nYou can make a wish on the nursery, and spawn with one skill style of LittleFairy fixed.
LanguageData.LitF.UI.Tips_Nursery_AddSkill: Certain creatures may give special skill styles or special general-purpose skills to the LittleFairy that is born. The system remembers up to 5 creatures, but if more are introduced, the possibility of inheritance from older creatures will be lost.
LanguageData.LitF.UI.NeedMoreFP: Cannot use the skill because FP is 0.
LanguageData.LitF.UI.NeedMoreFPorBrilliance: Cannot use the skill because FP and Brilliance is 0.
LanguageData.LitF.UI.CantAddSkill: No more skills can be learned.
LanguageData.LitF.UI.NurseryBirth: Something came out of the nursery.
LanguageData.LitF.Add.Succession_description: The ability is inherited from another race.
LanguageData.LitF.Event.Runaway_description: The same kind of people, terrified of brainwashing, are running rampant!
LanguageData.LitF.UI.ExplosiveEquipment: Draw the power of the glow and detonate the collar.\nLittleFairy is shattered, corpse and all.
